name: **Carrickboorla**
description: Carrickboorla L587-737 Sheet 37 This is a small low lying island lying just at the SW corner of Inishturk. A narrow channel separates the island from Inishturk, but is navigable by kayak. Landing is easiest onto rock shelves along its N edge. The island has little to hold ones interest save the super views in all directions. Breeding Bonxie recorded on adjacent slopes of Inishturk in August 2008.
